flights.FLIGHTS_FILES: IGC files on vario SD card

wifi.CONF_SAVE: WiFi configuration saved on the SD card.

ota.WARNING1: The update will begin, this page will no longer be accessible.
ota.WARNING2: At the end of the update, the vario will restart ...
ota.MESSAGE1: Please select the firmware file to upload to the vario:
ota.MESSAGE2: Usually this is a .bin format file
ota.MESSAGE3: The file was successfully uploaded to the vario. It will now be restarted to complete the update.
ota.UPDATE_ERR2: Failed to upload file, update aborted.

BEEP_FLYBEGIN.label: Beep at the flight start
BEEP_FLYBEGIN.help: Beep as soon as flight recording start

SLEEP_THRESHOLD_CPS.label: Deep sleep threshold (m/s)
SLEEP_THRESHOLD_CPS.help: Deep sleep threshold value if instrument does not exceed +/- this value during the "Time before deep sleep" (EG 0.5m/s)

TIME_ZONE.label: Time zone
TIME_ZONE.help: Defines the UTC time zone: France(+2) in summer (+1) in winter

ENABLE_NEAR_CLIMBING_ALARM.label: Alarm when entering or leaving a lifting zone

DISPLAY_INTEGRATED_CLIMB_RATE.label: Displays the integrated climb rate
DISPLAY_INTEGRATED_CLIMB_RATE.help: Display integrated climb rate or instantaneous values if disabled. If enabled set the integration time in ms. ! Climb rate integration time must not be more than glide ratio one !

RATIO_MAX_VALUE.label: Number of integration values ​​in the glide ratio calculation

RATIO_MIN_SPEED.label: Minimum speed taken into account for glide ratio

RATIO_CLIMB_RATE.label: Display glide ratio, sink rate or the both
RATIO_CLIMB_RATE.help: 1 Glide ratio, 2 sink rate, 3 the both alternatively

VARIOMETER_ENABLE_AGL.label: AGL display
VARIOMETER_ENABLE_AGL.help: Requires elevation files on SD card

ACCELERATION_MEASURE_STANDARD_DEVIATION.label: Kalman filter settings
ACCELERATION_MEASURE_STANDARD_DEVIATION.help: This parameter  directly influences the kalman filter (value between 0.3 and 0.6)

SETTINGS_VARIO_PERIOD_COUNT.label: Integration period
SETTINGS_VARIO_PERIOD_COUNT.help: between 0 and 40 (Integration period by 50ms step between 0 and 2s

IGC_SEND_CALIBRATED_ALTITUDE.label: Use calibrated altitude in IGC files

BLUETOOTH_SEND_CALIBRATED_ALTITUDE.label: Use calibrated altitude in bluetooth frames

FLIGHT_START_MIN_TIMESTAMP.label: Minimum time since start before flight recording in millisecond

FLIGHT_START_VARIO_HIGH_THRESHOLD.label: Flight start trigger threshold VZ max

FLIGHT_START_MIN_SPEED.label: Flight start trigger threshold - minimum speed

VARIOMETER_RECORD_WHEN_FLIGHT_START.label: Start of recording after start of flight

calibrate.TITLE: Calibration
calibrate.SUBTITLE: Calculation of the calibration file
HELP_BLOCK: Once the calibration procedure has been carried out, you
can generate the calibration file used by
the vario automatically from this screen.
This is to be done when a new calibration is carried out and only once.
The result of the calculation will be stored in the "variocal.cfg"
file stored at the root of the SD card.
This procedure will send your "RECORD00.CAL" file to a remote server
to run the calculations and may take a few seconds.
calibrate.perform_calibration: Start the generation of the calibration file

pref.Save_settings: The settings are saved on the SD card.
pref.dropbox_info1: You can do the Dropbox token in two steps.
pref.dropbox_info2: Clicking on "Get a code" the new window will be opened where you can connect to your Dropbox account, accept the requested authorisation and generate a code.
pref.dropbox_info3: You must copy the code into the code area that appears below.
pref.dropbox_info4: Next, you must click "Get a token" to get a token from your Dropbox account. The token will be automatically copied into the right field.
pref.dropbox_info5: You can save your settings and reload the page.
pref.dropbox_info6: Uploading to your Dropbox is activated.

mesvols.MESVOL_WARNING: This area must be empty. To do this, delete the erroneous tracks and send the valid tracks in your logbook.

actions.be_patient: Please be patient, it may take a while...
actions.no_conf: The configuration is not loaded yet!

sitelist.name: Name
sitelist.description: To copy coordinates from the map, left click at the desired location. These coordinates will be automatically pasted when creating a new location.

dropbox_msg.error_upload: Error while uploading to your Dropbox
dropbox_msg.error_upload_conflict: Conflict while uploading to your Dropbox, upload was canceled

UpLoad.info: Drop the files to upload here
UpLoad.success_upload: was successfully uploaded to the vario.
